name: event
description: Event helps you discover conferences and other interesting events around you. It also makes life easier for people organizing events by offering support for the different stages.

scripts.build:css: node-sass --include-path scss scss/main.scss static/css/main.css && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css static/css/ && cp node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css static/css/ && cp -R node_modules/font-awesome/fonts static/ && cp node_modules/dropzone/dist/min/dropzone.min.css static/css/
scripts.build:js: cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js static/js/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js static/js/ && cp node_modules/devbridge-autocomplete/dist/jquery.autocomplete.min.js static/js/ && cp node_modules/dropzone/dist/min/dropzone.min.js static/js/
scripts.start: echo '>> Use pm2 to start this service!'
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
